title: Tour de France Stage 18: Victor Campenaerts Powers Home in Three-Up Sprint, GC Faves Cool Jets
content:
Campenaerts takes emotional and unexpected sprint win at end of long, hot breakaway stage, overall contenders hold fire.

Read the full article at Tour de France Stage 18: Victor Campenaerts Powers Home in Three-Up Sprint, GC Faves Cool Jets on Velo.
author: sstokes
